findings.title: Centralized Control of State Variable
findings.description: Critical state variables can be updated at any time by the controlling authorities without notifying users.

findings.title: Denial of Service on Withdrawal
findings.description: Due to the revert in the decreased liquidity process, the user will be unable to withdraw their funds.

findings.title: Force Decrease Liquidity on Withdrawal
findings.description: The liquidity provided to PancakeSwap V3 can be forcefully decreased, resulting in platform users receiving less reward.

findings.title: Transaction Ordering Dependence
findings.description: The front-running attack can be performed, resulting in a bad swapping rate and loss of user reward.

findings.title: PancakeSwap V3 Pair Price Manipulation
findings.description: Several uses of returns from the PancakeV3Pool.slot0() function can be easily manipulated, resulting in unexpected behavior on the platform.

findings.title: Slippage Tolerance Exceed Price Range
findings.description: The increasePosition() function call may be reverted due to a large volume shifting the price across the position range, resulting in an invalid amount to add liquidity and potentially leading to operation failure.
